Posts.Content: I have been using it for the last year or more. About 3 months ago I discontinued its use because I was not sure of its effectiveness and it is expensive. My tumor markers went down and stabilized at an extremely low rate. Since discontinuing it my tumor markers have now started to go up again. I have metastatic breat cancer in the liver. It is generally considered inoperable. I have not tried chemo for this particular cancer.
Posts.Title: MGN-3
